How to Install cli-spinner on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • cli-spinner

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install cli-spinner on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing cli-spinner on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall cli-spinner in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install cli-spinner, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install cli-spinner Using apt

To install cli-spinner in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install cli-spinner using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install cli-spinner

The installation of cli-spinner might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install cli-spinner Using apt-get

To install cli-spinner using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install cli-spinner.

sudo apt-get -y install cli-spinner

Install cli-spinner Using Synaptic

To install cli-spinner using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install cli-spinner on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for cli-spinner. This will display the cli-spinner package in the package window, now to install cli-spinner, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the cli-spinner package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of cli-spinner.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install cli-spinner Using aptitude

To install cli-spinner on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of cli-spinner.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install cli-spinner using the command aptitude install cli-spinner.

sudo aptitude -y install cli-spinner

How to Upgrade cli-spinner on debian

If you want to upgrade the cli-spinner package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade cli-spinner using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade cli-spinner to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade cli-spinner.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade cli-spinner sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade cli-spinner

Upgrade cli-spinner using Aptitude

To upgrade cli-spinner using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade cli-spinner.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade cli-spinner

Upgrade cli-spinner using Synaptic

To upgrade cli-spinner using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for cli-spinner, now right-click cli-spinner, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade cli-spinner just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall cli-spinner on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall cli-spinner from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just cli-spinner, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove cli-spinner

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of cli-spinner

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of cli-spinner you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge cli-spinner

Remove cli-spinner using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall cli-spinner using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for cli-spinner, right-click the cli-spinner package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall cli-spinner click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install cli-spinner on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade cli-spinner using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of cli-spinner then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
